site_name: Six Bridges Industrial Estate, Telecommunication Mast Land
description: Proposed upgrade to the existing telecommunications apparatus. Proposed EE delta headframe, 1No. Z-BRACKET & 1No. Stand-Off bracket c/w bracing arm to be installed. Proposed EE 7No. CHSØ88.9mm, 2.0m long antenna support poles, 1No. CHSØ76.1mm, 2.0m long Z-bracket pole & 2No. CHSØ60.3mm, 2.0m long antenna support poles to be installed onto proposed headframe. Existing steelwork to be removed. Proposed EE 3No. 5G antennas at 16.3m to be installed onto proposed headframe. Proposed EE 6No. RRU's to be installed onto proposed CHS poles rear to relocated antennas. Proposed EE 1No. GPS module to be installed. proposed EE 1No. AIRI cabinet to be installed. H3G & EE 6No. LDF5-50 feeders & EE 3No. multimode trunk to be re-used (subject to testing). H3G & EE 6No. LDF5-50 feeders to be removed. Proposed 3No. single mode trunk & 3No. power only trunk to be installed. Existing feeder management to be utilised.  EE GPS module at 17.3m to be removed. H3G & EE 3No. 2-PORT antennas at 16.3m to be relocated onto proposed headaframe. EE 3No. 16-PORT antennas at 16.3m to be relocated onto proposed headframe. EE 3No. Mk2 BOB's to be relocated onto proposed headframe. EE 6No. RRU's to be removed. EE 3No. 1800 MHA's to be removed. EE 1No. BTS3900L cabinet to be removed. EE 1No. IMB05 on vertical steel support frame to be removed. Crabtree Polestar AC Distribution Board to be upgraded to proposed ICD11775 12WAY TP&N. Alifabs Monitor 3 (12Kw CEMS) to be upgraded to 16Kw CEMS System and associated ancillary works
